  • Constructor Details

    • SavingsAccount

      public SavingsAccount()
      Default constructor, which calls the super constructor from Account. Sets the interest rate and also calculates the annual earnings.

    • SavingsAccount

      Overloaded constructor created.
      Parameters:
      accountNo - sets account number
      customerName - sets customer name
      balance - sets balance for savings account

    • calculateAnnualEarnings

      public double calculateAnnualEarnings()
      Overriding method. Calculates the Annual Earnings for savings account. Annual earnings is equal to balance + (interest * balance)
      Specified by:
      calculateAnnualEarnings in class Account
      Returns:
      balance
